sequence.reasoning: Gentle welcoming gesture to open, sets calm tone for sad/relaxed mood
Thoughtful head tilt upward, contemplative pose matching sad mood
Calming movement to establish peaceful, relaxed energy
Breathing space at end of intro (total intro: 6.0s)
Smooth gentle sway, 3 cycles × 2 beats × 0.556s = 3.33s, matches relaxed mood
Subtle body turn with introspective head angle, explores space thoughtfully
Looking upward in contemplation, matches sad/thoughtful mood
Turn to opposite direction, exploring with gentle head movement
Soft rolling motion side-to-side, 2 cycles × 2 beats × 0.556s = 2.22s
Contemplative pause, stillness emphasizes melancholic mood
Gentle peekaboo, adds subtle emotional expressiveness, 1 cycle × 2 beats × 0.556s = 1.11s
Soothing calming gesture to reinforce relaxed, peaceful state

choreography_notes: This choreography emphasizes the sad (1.0) and relaxed (1.0) mood with minimal energy (0.0). The sequence prioritizes gentle swaying, contemplative poses, and calm emotional expressions. Manual body rotations (body_yaw ±45°) are subtle and thoughtful rather than energetic, creating a melancholic exploration of space. Idle pauses are used strategically for dramatic effect and emotional resonance. The danceability (1.10) is satisfied through smooth, flowing movements rather than sharp, rhythmic bursts.
